File:1974–1977 series Floridian state license plate with October 1979 sticker.png
Design: Embossed red serial on reflective white plate with border line; "FLORIDA" centered at top; "75" at top left
Notes: Coded by county of issuance (1 or 10) and weight class. Revalidated with stickers until 1980.

Design: Black on reflective yellow with border line; "19 ILLINOIS 75" at top.
Notes:
*Issued in the colors of Peoria-based Caterpillar Inc., in honor of its 50th anniversary.
*Three-letter prefix program expanded from about 800 combinations in 1974 to 2,851.
